Title: Saint Nick
Writer: Grant Morrison (developed by), Brian Taylor (developed by), Grant Morrison (teleplay by), Brian Taylor (teleplay by), Grant Morrison (based on the comic by)
Actors: Christopher Meloni, Ritchie Coster, Lili Mirojnick, Medina Senghore
Plot: A hit-man is forced to partner with an imaginary blue-winged unicorn to rescue a missing child.
